channel.title: PI Crown Help
channel.description: Short question: Does anybody know how to add a crown into the right click menu, so when you right click someone there is a crown next to their name? I've been trying at this for way too long.... And i literally don't have a clue on how to do this. If anyone can help I'd really appreciate it. Thanks

item.title: PI Crown Help
item.dc:creator: @uncalled_for uncalled for
item.description:
@uncalled_for wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:547412”][quote author=uncalled for link=topic=666317.msg4454898#msg4454898 date=1414096072]

I’ve never done it but I’m sure it’s possible, and it probably isn’t hard.

(Posting so you know someone actually took the time to reply to your thread).

Give me a minute, I’m searching in my client for the menu.

Edit 1:
Looks like you will probably have to modify your stream for your player class. Don’t worry I’ll show you how if all works right xD

Thanks for taking the time to help me
[/quote]
Having a hard time converting the font to the correct one.
Basically make sure you have
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/236030-new-text-engine-like-459-a.html
added to your client.

Then use this:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/364477-new-runescape-right-click-menus.html
As a reference. It’s to change your right click menus to the “new” runescape ones, but instead you want to convert the menu font to one of the following:
newSmallFont
newRegularFont
newBoldFont
newFancyFont[/quote]
Do you mind explaining the second part a bit more on how to actually add the crown
I have everything in the first part.

Read full topic

item.title: PI Crown Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“uncalled for, post:3, topic:547412”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=666317.msg4454897#msg4454897 date=1414095004]
I’ve never done it but I’m sure it’s possible, and it probably isn’t hard.

(Posting so you know someone actually took the time to reply to your thread).

Give me a minute, I’m searching in my client for the menu.

Edit 1:
Looks like you will probably have to modify your stream for your player class. Don’t worry I’ll show you how if all works right xD
[/quote]
Thanks for taking the time to help me :)[/quote]
Having a hard time converting the font to the correct one.
Basically make sure you have
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/236030-new-text-engine-like-459-a.html
added to your client.

Then use this:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/364477-new-runescape-right-click-menus.html
As a reference. It’s to change your right click menus to the “new” runescape ones, but instead you want to convert the menu font to one of the following:
newSmallFont
newRegularFont
newBoldFont
newFancyFont

Read full topic

item.title: PI Crown Help
item.dc:creator: @uncalled_for uncalled for
item.description:
@uncalled_for wrote:

Short question:
Does anybody know how to add a crown into the right click menu, so when you right click someone there is a crown next to their name?
I’ve been trying at this for way too long… And i literally don’t have a clue on how to do this.
If anyone can help I’d really appreciate it.
Thanks

Read full topic
